features: New, transparent formula with bio-based ingredients to whiten and brighten everyday laundry! 32 FL OZ (1 QT) 946 mL​
Enzyme complex tough on fresh and set in stains, dirt, and oil​ on white and light-colored garments.
Made specially to deep clean & brighten white clothing, suitable for all machines and water temperatures​.
Scented in Classic, the ultimate clean laundry smell with notes of lily of the valley and jasmine with sweet musk, sandalwood, and a touch of citrus.​
New lightweight consistency for less messy dosing. Designed to pair with our Laundry Measuring Cup for easy dosing (not included).
body.description: We know how hard it can be to keep your whites and light colors bright, which is why we specially formulated our Laundress Whites Detergent to help keep your whites gleaming and beautifully clean. Featuring bio-based ingredients and a powerful triple-enzyme complex, this all-purpose detergent deep cleans white and light-colored fabrics, fighting stubborn stains, dirt, and grease for expert laundering. Pair with our Laundry Measuring Cup for easy dosing (not included), and enjoy up to 31 washes of beautifully bright and white laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pricey, but I have just reordered. Whitens even dingy old whites

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing scent! Clean whites!
reviews.reviewText: Herewith, is a short tale of laundry ~Years ago, the Yankee Candle Company made a laundry detergent (yes, they really did) that had an intoxicating scent called Citrus & Sage. I loved it so much that I bought bottles and bottles and bottles of it. I have never found anything that remotely smelled the same, so a pretty sad day for me was soon to come as the last precious bottle from my stash was finally coming to an end.Then in comes Whites Detergent from The Laundress, the fabulous company that has already done the impossible and made me love doing laundry with their lovely products. I have elsewhere recommended their adorable little laundry brush and the stain-removal soap that goes with it.But back to the story. When I opened the bottle, I could not believe my nose! The scent that wafted up from the bottle to entertain my nostrils was the closest thing I've ever smelled to my beloved Citrus & Sage. In a side by side comparison with the remaining few tablespoons of Citrus & Sage, the Whites Detergent was not an exact match, but it is wonderful on its own.The performance of this detergent is also commendable. It's been quite effective on my whites, and honestly, is there anything better than clean, fresh-smelling laundry? I think not.I am thrilled with this detergent on every level upon which one can be thrilled with a laundry detergent.My only quibble is that it does not have a lid that serves to measure the amount to use, therefore, a measuring cup is needed. Unfortunately, that is usually always a messy affair.I can only hope that the Laundress does not discontinue this product. It's a detergent and aromatherapy wrapped up in one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don't wear a lot of white clothes, but I do have a few and am always in search of a way to keep them bright and smelling terrific. I was intrigued when I saw the fragrances that the detergent is comprised of, so I gave it a shot.The detergent smells amazing and has a strong scent. It's definitely not going to be a good option for someone who wants a more subtle option, but for those of us who like a lot of scent then this might be up your alley. The consistency of the liquid is comparable to some of the top brands available; it's not super thick, but it's not watery like something you would get at a dollar retailer. The flip cap is easy to use, but there's no way to accurately measure it unless you pour it into a measuring cup. I usually try to eyeball it, and the bottle has enough for approximately 32 medium loads. Larger and heavily soiled loads are going to take twice as much detergent for an effective clean, so the bottle won't last very long at that rate.As for brightening, the detergent performed similar to other whitening products I've used; no better but no worse. While I didn't have any heavy stains, it was effective at cleaning the average load of dirty laundry.Overall it has a wonderful fragrance and enjoyable to use, but it is a bit pricey for the amount you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome detergent for whites - smells great and works well!
reviews.reviewText: This detergent smells great, works well and you can tell is really high quality. The bottle is large and should last a good while. While the fragrance is nice, it is not overpowering and does not linger strongly on the clothes after washing. I have noticed a positive improvement in my white clothes, but I think this will be really great at keeping newer white clothes white. I have some whites with the usual sweat in the armpit and collar stains and this detergent definitely improve those but taking a proactive approach from the beginning will probably be best at keeping your whites nice and bright!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really made a difference in my Whites.
reviews.reviewText: From the first wash, I noticed a visible difference. My whites looked brighter and fresher, and it even managed to lift stains I had resigned to being permanent residents on my clothes.What’s fantastic about this detergent is its effectiveness while being gentle on fabrics. It doesn’t contain harsh chemicals that might damage delicate clothes. Plus, a little goes a long way, making it a cost-effective choice. However, I do notice there is not a lot of scent, I guess that is to be expected.Whether it's linens, shirts, or towels, this detergent has worked wonders. My husbands shirts do not look nearly as dingy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love The Laundress!
reviews.reviewText: I am a huge fan of products from The Laundress, so I was excited to try out this detergent to see if I could brighten up my white towels. They brought them back to life after a hot cycle! I will always recommend their detergents and the Whites Detergent impressed me just as much as my other go-tos, the delicates detergent and the cashmere and wool detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately, the bottle cap arrived in a broken condition
reviews.reviewText: When I received The Laundress Whites detergent, I was disappointed as the bottle cap was broken and had fallen off at the bottom of the box. A small amount of liquid was leaking in the corner. The detergent had a faint scent, reminiscent of laundry detergent. Despite the initial setback, I proceeded to use it. Washing my white bedspread with it proved effective, leaving a light scent after the wash. It's worth noting that the bottle is only 32oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant but robust smell
reviews.reviewText: We got this Laundress Whites Detergent, 32 oz, in Classic Scent to see if it could revive some of our dingy, well loved clothing and sheets. After a few uses, unfortunately, we don't really see a difference.Right away we noticed the scent. It is pleasant but some could definitely call it over bearing. It fades after a little time so I don't see an issue. It seems to clean as well as our usual, store brand, detergent. It might make some things brighter but we didn't notice.Our cap was broken in shipping and, fortunately, the bottle was sealed and didn't leak. It would be nice if some sort of measuring device was built in or included. We had to commandeer an old baby formula bottle to use.
